p: The determination of the TFC was used for the quality evaluation of the elaborated tinctures as flavonoids are known as plant secondary metabolites with known antioxidant activity [ 31]. The TFC was determined by the aluminum chloride colorimetric method which is described by Chan et al. [ 32] and Hudz et al. [ 33]. The linearity of the elaborated procedure was proved in the rutin concentration range of 10â€“100 mg/L ( Figure 2).
